name: IFEval
description: Developed a Large Language Model (LLM) evaluation framework in Clojure based on the work done by Google and Yale University.

name: PyPods
description: A lightweight solution to execute Python dependencies in an isolated fashion.

name: ASCII Chess
description: Developed Chess. It includes the implementation of all standard Chess rules with multiplayer support.

name: GoodEats
description: Developed a full-stack web application using React and Node.js for users to obtain nutritional information from images of food items.

name: Albums
description: JavaFX-based desktop app built using MVC architecture for storing pictures and albums.

name: Malloc/Free Clone
description: Memory allocation and deallocation library in C.

name: Concurrent File Formatter
description: Multithreaded CLI in C for concurrent text formatting.

name: Operating System Components
description: Libraries for POSIX thread emulation, virtual memory management, and FUSE-based file systems.
more: ● Designed and benchmarked a custom C library to implement Posix Threads (pthread) in user space, including thread mutex, scheduler, and essential thread functionality.

● Developed a library in C to simulate virtual memory. I implemented a 2-level page table to store the virtual address translations, and optimized page table lookup with a translation lookaside buffer
● Designed a file system using FUSE (Filesystem in Userspace). I implemented basic file system operations like ls, touch, mkdir, cd.
